statements: UPDATE clickstream_data SET action='click', duration_sec=10 WHERE user_id=101 AND page_id=1;
UPDATE clickstream_data SET timestamp='2020-06-15 12:30:00', duration_sec=20 WHERE user_id=202 AND page_id=3;
UPDATE clickstream_data SET duration_sec = 60 WHERE user_id = 12345 AND page_id = 54321;
UPDATE clickstream_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', action = 'click' WHERE user_id = 54321 AND page_id = 98765;
UPDATE web_clickstream_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 1 AND page_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET pattern_id = 456, pattern_description = 'New Pattern Description' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE web_clickstream_data SET event_type = 'Click' WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior_patterns SET pattern_id = 1001, pattern_description = 'New description' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE clickstream_data SET page_url='example.com/home' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET click_count=10, last_timestamp='2021-08-20 14:30:00' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE clickstream_data SET event_type = 'purchase', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE event_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_behavior SET click_count = click_count + 1, last_timestamp = '2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE WebClickstreamData SET click_event = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 101 AND page_id = 201
UPDATE UsersActivity SET activity_type = 'viewed' WHERE activity_id = 301
UPDATE WebClickstreamData SET click_event='clicked' WHERE user_id=123 AND timestamp>'2022-01-01'
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com', age=30 WHERE user_id=456
UPDATE user_profile SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE web_clickstream_data SET event_type = 'click', timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE event_id = 5678;
UPDATE web_clickstream_data SET page_url = 'updated_url', referrer_url = 'new_referrer_url' WHERE event_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_profile SET username = 'john_doe', last_login = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 98765;
